00171         LH_START_PROC("Lab2XYZ_forCube16")
00172 
00173         v = theCube;                                                                                    /* pos. of first color */
00174         
00175         for(i=0; i<count; i++)
00176         {
00177                 lon_L    = (long)v[0];
00178                 lon_aOff = (long)v[1];
00179                 lon_bOff = (long)v[2];
00180                 
00181         /* If Xl is an L*-distorted X value: Xl = 116/500 * a + L (from CIELAB formula).  */
00182                 
00183                 Xl = ((lon_aOff * 19 + 15) >> 5) - 19456 + lon_L;       /* -19456 for -128 */
00184                 if(Xl < 0)                                                                                      /* Xl=65535 with white */
00185                         Xl = 0;
00186                 else
00187                 {
00188                         index = Xl >> 8;
00189                         if(index > 431)                                         /* end of table */
00190                                 Xl = (long)L2Y[431] << 1;
00191                         else                                                                                    /* ordinary case */
00192                         {
00193                                 fract    = Xl & 0x0FF;                                          /* 8 bits for interpolation */
00194                                 leftVal  = (long)L2Y[index];
00195                                 rightVal = (long)L2Y[index + 1];
00196                                 lAux     = (fract * (rightVal - leftVal) + 63) >> 7;    /* one bit more */
00197                                 Xl       = (leftVal << 1) + lAux;
00198                         }
00199                 }
00200                 
00201         /* If Zl is an L*-distorted Z value: Zl = L - 116/200 * b (from CIELAB formula).  */
00202 
00203                 Zl = lon_L - ((lon_bOff * 95 + 31) >> 6) + 48640;       /* +48640 for -128 */
00204                 if(Zl < 0)                                                                                      /* Zl=65535 with white */
00205                         Zl = 0;
00206                 else
00207                 {
00208                         index = Zl >> 8;
00209                         if(index > 431)                                         /* end of table */
00210                                 Zl = (long)L2Y[431] << 1;
00211                         else                                                                                    /* ordinary case */
00212                         {
00213                                 fract    = Zl & 0x0FF;                                          /* 8 bits for interpolation */
00214                                 leftVal  = (long)L2Y[index];
00215                                 rightVal = (long)L2Y[index + 1];
00216                                 lAux     = (fract * (rightVal - leftVal) + 63) >> 7;    /* one bit more */
00217                                 Zl       = (leftVal << 1) + lAux;
00218                         }
00219                 }
00220                                 
00221                 Yl = lon_L;
00222                 {
00223                         index = Yl >> 8;                                                                /* Y value; L<=100 -> Y index < 431 */
00224                         {                                                                                               /* ordinary case */
00225                                 fract    = Yl & 0x0FF;                                          /* 8 bits for interpolation */
00226                                 leftVal  = (long)L2Y[index];
00227                                 rightVal = (long)L2Y[index + 1];
00228                                 lAux     = (fract * (rightVal - leftVal) + 63) >> 7;    /* one bit more */
00229                                 Yl       = (leftVal << 1) + lAux;
00230                         }       
00231                 }
00232                 
00233                 
00234                         /* D50 adjustment for X and Z, which are in 0 ... 1.623 range */
00235                 Xl = (Xl * 31595 + 16384) >> 15;                /* factor 0.9642 */
00236                 Zl = (Zl * 13515 +  8192) >> 14;                /* factor 0.8249 */
00237 
00238                 if (Xl > 65535) Xl = 65535;
00239                 if (Zl > 65535) Zl = 65535;
00240                 
00241                 *v++ = (unsigned short)Xl;                                                      /* X value */
00242                 *v++ = (unsigned short)Yl;                                                      /* Y value */
00243                 *v++ = (unsigned short)Zl;                                                      /* Z value */
00244         }
00245         LH_END_PROC("Lab2XYZ_forCube16")
00246 }

00331 #else
00332         static unsigned short   Y2L[439] = {                    /* Y==1.0 is at 256 (not 255) and -> 2^15-1 Static OK? */
00333                                                     0,  1156,  2312,  3391,  4260,  4993,  5635,  6208,
00334                                                  6730,  7209,  7654,  8070,  8462,  8833,  9185,  9520,

00389         
00390         LH_START_PROC("XYZ2Lab_forCube16")
00391 
00392         v = theCube;                                                    /* pos. of first color */
00393 
00394         for(i=0; i<count; i++)
00395         {
00396                 lon_X = (long)v[0];                                     /* lin. 16 bit XYZ values */
00397                 lon_Y = (long)v[1];
00398                 lon_Z = (long)v[2];
00399                 
00400                         /*------transform to L* - distorted values------*/
00401                         
00402                 index = lon_Y >> 7;             /* adjust for table lookup, lin. XYZ: 1.0 -> 32767 */
00403                 fract = lon_Y & 0x7F;   /* 7 bit for interpolation */
00404                 if(index < 431)                 /* within table range ? */
00405                 {
00406                         leftVal  = Y2L[index];
00407                         rightVal = Y2L[index + 1];
00408                         lon_Y    = leftVal + ((fract * (rightVal - leftVal) + 63) >> 7);
00409                 }
00410                 else
00411                         lon_Y = Y2L[431];                               /* clip to the end of the table */
00412                 
00413                         /* D50 to white adjustment for X and Z:*/
00414                 
00415                 lon_X = 531 * lon_X >> 4;       /* factor 1./0.9642 with (* 531 >> 9) */
00416                 index = lon_X >> 12;
00417                 fract = lon_X & 0x0FFF;         /* (9 - 4) + 7 = 12 bit for interpolation */
00418                 if(index < 431)                         /* within table range ? */
00419                 {
00420                         leftVal  = Y2L[index];
00421                         rightVal = Y2L[index + 1];
00422                         lon_X    = leftVal + ((fract * (rightVal - leftVal) + 2047) >> 12);
00423                 }
00424                 else
00425                         lon_X = Y2L[431];                               /* clip to the end of the table */
00426                 
00427                 lon_Z = lon_Z * 9931 >> 8; /* factor 1./0.8249 with (* 9931 >> 13) */
00428                 index = lon_Z >> 12;
00429                 fract = lon_Z & 0x0FFF;         /* (13 - 8) + 7 = 12 bit for interpolation */
00430                 if(index < 431)                         /* within table range ? */
00431                 {
00432                         leftVal  = Y2L[index];
00433                         rightVal = Y2L[index + 1];
00434                         lon_Z    = leftVal + ((fract * (rightVal - leftVal) + 2047) >> 12);
00435                 }
00436                 else
00437                         lon_Z = Y2L[431];                               /* clip to the end of the table */
00438                 
00439         /* lon_Z, lon_Z, lon_Z are L* -distorted values now with 100 <-> 32767 */
00440                 
00441                                 /* 431 >> 7 : factor 3.3676 = 500. / 116. * 100 / 32767 * 256 */
00442                 lon_aOff = ((lon_X - lon_Y) * 431 + 4194368) >> 7; /* 4194368 = (32768 + 0.5) * 2^7 */
00443                 if(lon_aOff & 0xFFFF0000)
00444                 {                                                       /* clip to range 0...65535 (a = -128 ... 127.996) */
00445                         if(lon_aOff < 0)
00446                                 lon_aOff = 0;
00447                         else if(lon_aOff > 65535)
00448                                 lon_aOff = 65535;
00449                 }
00450                 
00451                                 /* 11035 >> 13 : factor 1.437 = 200. / 116. * 100 / 32767 * 256 */
00452                 lon_bOff = ((lon_Y - lon_Z) * 11035 + 268439552) >> 13; /* 268439552 = (32768 + 0.5) * 2^13 */
00453                 if(lon_bOff & 0xFFFF0000)
00454                 {                                                       /* clip to range 0...65535 (b = -128 ... 127.996) */
00455                         if(lon_bOff < 0)
00456                                 lon_bOff = 0;
00457                         else if(lon_bOff > 65535)
00458                                 lon_bOff = 65535;
00459                 }
00460                 
00461                 lon_Y <<= 1;                    /* see range of table above */
00462                 if(lon_Y > 65535)
00463                         lon_Y = 65535;          /* clip L if > 100 */
00464 
00465                 *v++ = (unsigned short)lon_Y;           /* L */
00466                 *v++ = (unsigned short)lon_aOff;        /* a */
00467                 *v++ = (unsigned short)lon_bOff;        /* b */
00468         }
00469         LH_END_PROC("XYZ2Lab_forCube16")
00470 }
